title: Folder
description: This schema defines the Folder entity.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies this data instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this folder.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

serviceType.description: Service type this data is hosted in.

service.description: Link to the storage service where this folder is hosted in.

parent.description: Link to the parent data under which this entity sits, if not top level.

children.description: References to child residing under this entity.

numberOfObjects.description: The number of objects/files this folder has.

size.description: The total size in KB this folder has.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

lifeCycle.description: Life Cycle properties of the entity
